data.title: Eldad Persky on LinkedIn: The news out of Yahoo yesterday was not surprising necessarily, but…
data.meta_description: The news out of Yahoo yesterday was not surprising necessarily, but shocking nonetheless. I am truly saddened to see teams, products and businesses that many… | 22 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
It was a lot of fun chatting with Chris Cohen about my professional journey in the media / tech space over the last 20+ years. Our conversation is now published on the latest episode of Wolfed, from QA Wolf! As an SVP at Samsung, I hold what you might call a technical general manager role. I lead an incredible global team of product managers, designers, engineers, architects, analysts, researchers and partnership managers. I spoke to Chris about where I come from, how I got where I am, and what I learned in the process. In this episode, we discuss: My career journey from computer science major to leading teams at Samsung Navigating cross-team collaboration in large corporations Building international teams that deliver impactful solutions Fostering a culture of innovation from the top down Tune in for the full conversation! Listen now: https://bit.ly/3xBJj7Z #Leadership #TechInnovation #GlobalTeams #Success #Podcast

It was great to visit our amazing Samsung Ads Product & Engineering team in Bangalore this week. It was truly exciting to celebrate the one-year anniversary of the Zapr acquisition, and experience firsthand the momentum and energy of our unified team. What started as a speculative experiment a few short years ago, transformed into a thriving, hundreds-of-people strong, highly productive and independent team. I couldn't be more grateful to Dipesh Shah, Mohan Rao, Dr. Vikram Vij, Balaji Hariharan, Sanjeev Prasad, Amit Chowdhury, Manu Prasad and the rest of the SRIB leadership team for their proactive support and partnership over the last few years, and also for the warm hospitality this week! Special thanks also to Shashikumar Singh and Roy Kim (김동광) for so patiently dealing with my ever-shifting schedule! Rohit Garg Prashant Gangwar Deepak Baid Kartik Rajan Priyanshu Jain Siddharth Shankar Agarwal Sajo Mathews Puneet Saini Kaja Mohideen Sandeep Kumar Soni Sreejit Ramakumar Sanket Kabra Himanshu Bora Apurvaa Vijay Sharada Abhishek P. Lech Alves

It was great to bring together my senior leadership team from all over the globe this week! A great team, a powerful workshop, and a beautiful e-bike tour of 17-Mile Drive! Benjamin Bazso Rui Chen Siddharth Shankar Agarwal SungHan Kim Soo-Hyun Choi Marcin Witkowski Esco Strong Sean Zehnder SeungBin Im Roy Kim (김동광) Prashant Gangwar Hyowon kim Jon Levinson Michael Richardson Herve Marcellini Kristin Weber Swetha G Basavaraj Patrick Schoonveld Srini Deeduvanu David Trefou Sangchul Song, Monica Agarwal, PMP, Joanne Son, Rohit Garg, Adam Dhanens, Dr. Vikram Vij, Balaji Hariharan, James Jongmin Choi, David Burton, Deepak Baid, Harish Bishnoi & Pascal Deschênes, you were missed! Hope to see you next time...
